short_summary: Request for Proposal - DND 404 Drivers Licensing Agreement
description: DND has a requirement for a contractor to design, produce and deliver the DND Driver’s Licenses (DL) IAW Canadian Driver License Agreement (CDLA) requirements. The requirement includes the replacement of expired DLs.
duration_in_months: At least 2 years, with 4 one-year options
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement

**Reference Number**: PW-23-01024545
**Solicitation Number**: W6369-23-X012
**Publication Date**: February 2, 2023
**Tender Closing Date**: March 28, 2023, 2:00 PM EST

**Contract Name**: DND 404 Drivers Licensing Agreement

## Tender Description

The Department of National Defence invites proposals for the design, production, and delivery of the DND Driver’s Licences (DL) in accordance with the Canadian Driver Licence Agreement (CDLA) requirements. The requirement includes the replacement of expiring DLs.

## Contract Requirements

The successful bidder will be required to:

* Design, produce, and deliver the DLs for a period of approximately two years, with the option to extend for four (4) one-year periods
* Proven capability to deliver a minimum of 20,000 DLs per year
* Detailed requirements and deliverables are outlined in Annex “A” of the Request for Proposal

## Addressing Services Requirements

Bidders must provide information in accordance with article 2.3 of Part 2 of the bid solicitation, as per Treasury Board policies and directives on contracts awarded to former public servants.

## Mandatory Criteria

The Mandatory Criteria are detailed in the Request for Proposal (RFP).

## Terms and Conditions

The Department of National Defence reserves the right not to award a Contract, regardless of the responses it receives.

# Government Trade Agreements

This tender is subject to the following trade agreements:

* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)

# Contact Information

For more information, please contact:

* Jeremy Quattrocchi, Contracting Authority
* Email: [jeremy.quattrocchi@forces.gc.ca](mailto:jeremy.quattrocchi@forces.gc.ca)
* Phone: 819-939-428
